com.xilinx.rapidwright.device

Class NodeTemplates

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xilinx.rapidwright.device.NodeTemplates

  • public class NodeTemplates
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a container for all unique node/wire shapes within a given device. Created on: Sep 30, 2015

      • getTemplates

        public int[][] getTemplates()
        Gets the entire set of node templates as an array.
        Returns:
        the entire set of node templates as an array

      • getRawTemplate

        public int[] getRawTemplate(int index)
        Gets the raw node template at the specific index. A raw node template is an array of ints where each two consecutive ints are a relative wire designation within the node. The two ints are packed 0(or even)=[DX_MASK|DYMASK] 1(or odd)=[wireIndex].
        Parameters:
        index - The desired template index to get.
        Returns:
        The raw node template at the given index, or null if out of bounds.

      • getTileFromTemplate

        public static Tile getTileFromTemplate(Tile reference,
                                       int[] template,
                                       int offset)
        Given a node template (int[]) and reference tile, this method will calculate the tile instance that the template refers to for the given offset.
        Parameters:
        reference - This is the starting tile of the node in question.
        template - The node template corresponding to the origin tile.
        offset - This is the specific wire index within the node template to get.
        Returns:
        The actual tile instance specified by the node template and reference tile.

      • getTileXOffsetFromTemplate

        public static int getTileXOffsetFromTemplate(int[] template,
                                             int offset)
        Gets the relative tile X offset from a reference tile to get the destination tile at the specified offset of the node template.
        Parameters:
        template - The node template to use
        offset - The offset index within the node template to examine for a tile offset
        Returns:
        The X offset (columns) that can be added to a reference X coordinate to get the destination tile in the node template.

      • getTileYOffsetFromTemplate

        public static int getTileYOffsetFromTemplate(int[] template,
                                             int offset)
        Gets the relative tile Y offset from a reference tile to get the destination tile at the specified offset of the node template.
        Parameters:
        template - The node template to use
        offset - The offset index within the node template to examine for a tile offset
        Returns:
        The Y offset (rows) that can be added to a reference Y coordinate to get the destination tile in the node template.

      • getWireIndexFromTemplate

        public static int getWireIndexFromTemplate(int[] template,
                                           int offset)
        Gets the wire index at the given offset in the template.
        Parameters:
        template - The template to get the wire from
        offset - The offset within the template to get the wire from.
        Returns:
        The wire index of the destination tile type as specified by the node template.

      • getWireFromTemplate

        public static Wire getWireFromTemplate(Tile reference,
                                       int[] template,
                                       int offset)
        Gets the corresponding wire as specified by the offset from the given template.
        Parameters:
        reference - The reference tile from which the node starts
        template - The node template of interest
        offset - The offset within the node template specifying the wire of interest
        Returns:
        The Wire object corresponding to the specific wire instance in the node.
